ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get IM Metrics
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get IM Metrics
ActivityMetadata.Description: Get [metrics](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204654719-Dashboard#h_cc7e9749-1c70-4afb-a9a2-9680654821e4) on how users are utilizing the Zoom Chat Client. You can specify a monthly date range for the dashboard data using the `from` and `to` query parameters. The month should fall within the last six months. **Scope:** `dashboard_im:read:admin` **Prerequisites:** * Business or a higher plan.
